A maruell, deciphered Helwys, Edward.
[12], 12 p.
Printed by Robert Robinson, for Iohn VVinnington, at the golden Tunne neere to S. Dunstones Church in Fleete-streete, At London : 1589.
Signed at end: Edward Hellwis. On Revelation XII. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
